H0.text: In the children’s tv cartoon series, who is Inspector Gadget’s arch enemy. Professor Mad

H1.text: In the children’s tv cartoon series, who is Inspector Gadget’s arch enemy. The Brain

H2.text: In the children’s tv cartoon series, who is Inspector Gadget’s arch enemy. Lord Cybro

H3.text: In the children’s tv cartoon series, who is Inspector Gadget’s arch enemy. Dr Claw

A4.text: Inspector Gadget’s nemesis is Dr. Claw, the leader of an evil organization, known as “M.A.D.”

A5.text: Brain, who are truly responsible for thwarting M.A.D.
